comprehensive_overview: purge_dups is a tool designed for the elimination of duplicate or repetitive DNA sequences in genomes. It is particularly useful in analyzing and cleaning up repetitive elements in genomic sequences.
core_features: 1. Identification and removal of duplicate DNA sequences. 2. Efficient cleaning of repetitive sequences within genomes. 3. Improved genome assembly by eliminating redundancy. 4. Customizable parameters for tailored sequence analysis.
